Name: Slime Corp
About the game: Slime Corp is a retro styled arcade top down shooter. The main goal of the game is to go on slime collection missions & collect enough slime to meet your quota by shooting enemy slimes & collecting their blood with a tractor beam. Randomly generated levels & procedural enemy generation Unlockable weapons, different area styles, and different game modes. Retro styled VFX & SFX. Lots and lots of pixel carnage.
